item.title: Oh git…
item.description: So this post is sort of just my list of useful git things - partly to save me from having to remember everything. Best introduction and workflow care of @jtonline All the files that you have changed in this commit <pre class="EnlighterJSRAW" data-enlighter-group="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-language="shell" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-title="">git diff-tree --name-only -r HEAD~1..HEAD
